name: Baby Maria Care & Dress Up - Play, Love and Have Fun with Babies
name_original: Baby Maria Care & Dress Up - Play, Love and Have Fun with Babies
description:
Here comes a Baby Maria to get dressed in cute and adoring dresses. Maria is new baby launched in gaming world so help her to dress up. This game is all about fashion,styles,creativity. Come and help baby maria to choose cute dress with matching accessories.

Hi girls. Do you loveBaby Maria girl games? Here we have a new baby dress up game especially for you. All girls dream to have a little baby and here in this game for girls you can have one to take care of him. Meet a sweet baby who loves to play every day. In this game you have the opportunity to choose his clothes. pick up the most beautiful clothes and make sure he will look fabulous to be in the spotlight.Play this new baby game and don't forget to leave us a review if you like it!
